bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Ethernet Amendment: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for 100 Mb/s Operation over a Single Balanced Twisted Pair Cable (100BASE-T1)
IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Ethernet Amendment: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for 100 Mb/s Operation over a Single Balanced Twisted Pair Cable (100BASE-T1)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.3bw/D3.3, August 2015 (Amendment of IEEE Std 802.3-201x)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE 802.3 Standard for Ethernet defines the 100BASE-T1 Physical Layer (PHY) specifications and management parameters for point-to-point full duplex 100 Mb/s operation over single balanced twisted pair cabling. This specification provides fully functional and electrical specifications for the type 100BASE-T1 PHY. This specification also specifies the baseband medium used with 100BASE-T1

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
